physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a large double storey roofed building. There are numerous windows. A car and a bicycle can be seen stationed at the porch of the building, at the centre of the photograph. The building is partially covered with trees at the right and left corner of the photograph.
title_text: Y.M.C.A. Kempeitai Torture House Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Jails Torture Young Men's Christian assosications
